title: Horrendous FPS drops
body: Rito plz make the game more bearable, FPS is getting worse by patch. It's near unwinnable currently and I can only imagine it becoming unplayable as patches go on.

replies.body: Post your detailed hardware/software specs and sent a ticket. This only happens to a small number of players, and it will get fixed faster if riot gets information to pin down the hardware or software involved.
